column1: # TITLE: Ranavirus and helminth parasite co-infection in invasive American bullfrogs in the Atlantic Forest; Brazil
# DATE: Published 2024; Collection October 2018 - April 2019; Ranavirus qPCR testing August 2019 - March 2020
# AUTHORS: Drs. Lauren V. Ash; Karla Magalhaes Campiao; Caue Pinheiro Teixeira; Nicholas J. Gotelli
# AUTHOR ADDRESS: University of Vermont; 109 Carrigan Dr; Marsh Life Science; Burlington; VT 05405
# OWNERSHIP: Drs. Lauren Ash and Karla Magalhaes Campiao
# COLLABORATORS: Caue Pinheiro Teixeira; Dr. Nicholas J. Gotelli

# FUNDING SOURCES: University of Vermont Fabri Fialho and John Wheeler Awards; Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel and the Federal University of Parana; Council for Scientific and Technological Development
# SAMPLING LOCATIONS: We collected; measured; and euthanized 65 specimens of American bullfrogs (Aquarana catesbeiana) sampled from 9 sites across three states of Brazil in the Atlantic Forest biome
# SAMPLING TIMES: Bullfrogs were collected October 2018 - April 2019
# VARIABLE DESCRIPTION: 'Locality' and 'State' columns are the Brazilian city/town and states; respectively; where bullfrog collections took place

# VARIABLE DESCRIPTION: 'Latitude' and 'Longitude correspond to the coordinates of the bullfrog collection locations; 'LatMap' and 'LongMap' correspond to adjusted lat and long coordinates for visualizing pie charts on the map; 'Altitude' was extracted for each location but was not used in this study
# VARIABLE DESCRIPTION: 'N' is the bullfrog sample size at each location; 'TotAbund' is the total abundance of helminth parasite taxa in the bullfrog

# VARIABLE DESCRIPTION: The 'Acantho'; 'Nema'; 'Penta'; and 'Platy' columns contain counts of helminth parasites from either Acanthocephala; Nematoda; Platyhelminthes (Trematoda and Cestoda); or Pentastomida (respectively);

# VARIABLE DESCRIPTION: 'RV_load' corresponds to the average Ranavirus viral load (copies per ng of DNA) of individuals at the site (includes zeroes); 'RV_PosN' corresponds to the number of Ranavirus-positive individuals at the site
# DATA TRACK CHANGES LOG (use this section to record any changes to the data set after it is created)
